name: Existence (itch) (sa3san)
description:
An ordinary guy wrongfully imprisoned gets struck by lightning and gains the ability to switch to a ghost Controls: How to play:
  • Escape the dungeon by switching back and forth between human and ghost form.
Tips:
  • Ghost: fast, lightweight and can walk through objects.
  • Human: jump high and can interact with objects.
Credits:

By: Sawsan ~ sa3san.co
